name: Button disabler (For cutscenes)
author: Avaro
info: Put an FFC with this script on a screen to disable all button inputs on that screen. Good for cutscenes.In my opinion it's a hassle to make a new DMap for cutscenes to disable Link's items and letting Link use items during cutscenes is unprofessional. So here's a simple script for that situation.
description: Put an FFC with this script on a screen to disable all button inputs on that screen. If you use "Messages freeze all actions" you'll still be able to adcance message strings on that screen.
setup: Put an FFC with this script on any screen where you want to use it.Needs only std.zh which comes with ZC.
